edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.encryption
Interface AsymAdditiveHomomorphicEnc

All Superinterfaces:
AsymmetricEnc, Cpa, Eav, EncSecLevel, Indistinguishable, SecurityLevel
All Known Subinterfaces:
DamgardJurikEnc
All Known Implementing Classes:
ScDamgardJurikEnc
public interface AsymAdditiveHomomorphicEnc
extends AsymmetricEnc

General interface for asymmetric additive homomorphic encryption. Such encryption schemes can compute the encryption of m1+m2, given only the public key and the encryptions of m1 and m2.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Yael Ejgenberg)
